spiritsExplanation:
The workout video '10 Minute Tone Your ARM Workout With WEIGHTS' from the 'fabulous50s' channel suggests a 'Structured & Disciplined' spirit due to the methodical approach of targeting specific muscle groups such as the biceps, triceps, and shoulders with dumbbells. The description emphasizes a controlled, challenging workout suitable for beginners and seniors, indicating a focus on technique and progression, hence a score of 0.75. The repeated mention of arm burning and visible changes in the user comments further supports this methodical nature. 

A 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit is also present, given the short, continuous nature of the workout, and the emphasis on feeling accomplished and experiencing a 'burn' in a rhythmic fashion as confirmed by the comments from users who enjoy the flow of the 10-minute session. This spirit is secondary with a score of 0.5 as the workout seems to also integrate some sustained movement. 

Other spirits like 'High-Energy & Intense' or 'Soothing & Restorative' were excluded due to the moderate intensity and goal-oriented structure more befitting the intended mature audience.
